name: Aesculus hippocastanum
Relationship: AESCULUS GLABRA - Ohio-Buckeye Proctitis. Very painful, dark purple, external hemorrhoids, with constipation and vertigo and portal congestion. Speech thick, tickling in throat, impaired vision, paresis. PHYTOLACCA (throat dry, more often in acute cases.) NEGUNDIUM AMERICANUM - Box-elder - (Engorgements of rectum and piles with great pain, ten-drop dose of tincture every two hours.) Compare also: Aloe, Collinsonia. Nux-v. Sulphur.
Modalities: Worse: walking; from moving bowels; after eating

Chest: Heart's action full and heavy, can feel pulsations all over
Laryngitis; coughs depending on hepatic disorders; hot feeling in chest; pain around heart in hemorrhoidal subjects
Head: Neuralgic stitches from right to left through forehead, followed by flying pains in epigastrium
Pain from occiput to frontal region, with bruised sensation of the scalp; worse in the morning
Vertigo when sitting and walking
Pressure in forehead, with nausea, followed by stitches in right hypochondrium
Depressed and irritable
Head dull, confused, aching as from a cold
Fever: Sweat profuse and hot with the fever
Fever 7 to twelve pm evening fever, skin hot and dry
Chill at four pm chilliness up and down back
Stomach: Weight of a stone, with gnawing, aching pain; most manifest about three hours after meals
Tenderness and fullness in region of liver
Abdomen: Jaundice; throbbing in hypogastrium and pelvis
Dull aching in liver and epigastrium
Mouth: Tongue thickly coated, feels as if scalded
Rectum: Hemorrhoids; with sharp shooting pains up the back; blind and bleeding; worse during climacteric
Irritation caused by ascarides and aids their expulsion
Mucous membrane seems swollen and obstructs the passage
Burning in anus with chills up and down the back
Much pain after stool, with prolapse
Eyes: Heavy and hot, with lachrymation, with enlarged blood vessels
Throat: Hawking of ropy mucus of sweetish taste
Hot, dry, raw, stitching pain into ears when swallowing
Follicular pharyngitis connected with hepatic congestion
Veins in pharynx distended and tortuous
Early stages of atrophic pharyngitis in dried-up, bilious subjects
Throat sensitive to inspired air; feels excoriated and constricted, burns like fire on swallowing, in afternoon
Nose: Dry; inspired air feels cold, nasal passages sensitive to it
Membrane over turbinate bones distended and boggy, dependent upon hepatic disorders
Male: Discharge of prostatic fluid at stool
Urine: Frequent, scant, dark, muddy, hot urine
Pain in kidneys, especially left and ureter
Back: Hands and feet swell, and become red after washing, feel full
Backache affecting sacrum and hips; worse walking or stooping
Soles feels sore, tired, and swell
Lameness in neck; aching between shoulder blades; region of spine feels weak; back and legs give out
Female: Leucorrhoea, with lameness of back across the sacro-illiac articulation; dark, yellow, sticky corroding; worse after menses
Extremities: Aching and soreness in limbs, in left acromion process with shooing down arms; finger tips numb

details: The action of this drug is most marked on the lower bowel, producing engorged hemorrhoidal veins, with characteristic backache, with absence of actual constipation. Much pain but little bleeding. Venous stasis general, varicose veins of purple color; everything is slowed down, digestion, heart, bowels, etc. Torpor and congestion of the liver and portal system, with constipation. The back aches and gives out and unfits the patient for business. Flying pains all over. FULLNESS IN VARIOUS PARTS; dry, swollen mucous membranes. Throat with hemorrhoidal conditions.
